articles.content: The Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has moved a proposal to transfer 100 crore from its unclaimed funds, in excess of 58,000 crore, to the Senior Citizens' Welfare Fund, in line with a … [+1481 chars]

articles.title: Indoor Skydiving to be launched for the first time in India at Hyderabad - Telangana Today
articles.description: By Sruthi Kuruganti Hyderabad: For the first time in India, GravityZip is all set to offer the thrill of flying high, and of simulated free fall, with its indoor skydiving at Gandipet in the city. There is no plane nor is there a parachute, just ride the smoo…

articles.title: London Metal Exchange cancels nickel trades after price doubles - Reuters.com
articles.description: The London Metal Exchange (LME) cancelled all nickel trades that took place on Tuesday when prices doubled in a matter of hours and spurred the exchange to suspend trading.

articles.title: Google Buys Cybersecurity Firm Mandiant for $5.4 Billion - The Hacker News
articles.description: Google is officially buying cybersecurity company Mandiant in an all-cash deal approximately valued at $5.4 billion.
articles.content:
Google is officially buying threat intelligence and incident response company Mandiant in an all-cash deal approximately valued at $5.4 billion, the two technology firms announced Tuesday.
